contest-event.event-date:
May 21, 1907 D Huddersfield Contest
Huddersfield Band of Hope Union Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Huddersfield Band of Hope Union Contest huddersfield-contest-1
None
Daughter of the Regiment [unknown arranger]
Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK 1st prize £16, 2nd prize £10, 3rd prize £6 and 4th prize £4 divided between Wyke and Grimesthorpe, 5th prize £2.10s., 6th prize £2, 7th prize £1. 9 bands competed.
March 21, 2012, 4:45 p.m. Sept. 18, 2018, 8:43 a.m.
1 Lindley Band Ben Lodge
2 Halifax King Cross Angus Holden
3 Grimesthorpe George H. Mercer
3 Wyke William Rimmer
5 Linthwaite Silver Band Alfred Gray
6 Scapegoat Hill Angus Holden
7 Heptonstall Band Angus Holden
Unknown Result Huddersfield Fire Brigade J. W. Milnes
Unknown Result Beeston Humber J. E. Irons
